trans-unit.source: Application Insights for iOS apps | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Application Insights for iOS apps | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Analyze usage and performance of your iOS app with Application Insights.
trans-unit.target: Analyze usage and performance of your iOS app with Application Insights.

trans-unit.source: Application Insights for iOS apps
trans-unit.target: Application Insights for iOS apps

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio Application Insights lets you monitor your mobile application for usage, events, and crashes.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio Application Insights lets you monitor your mobile application for usage, events, and crashes.

trans-unit.source: Requirements
trans-unit.target: Requirements

trans-unit.source: You'll need:
trans-unit.target: You'll need:

trans-unit.source: A subscription with [Microsoft Azure](http://azure.com).
trans-unit.target: A subscription with [Microsoft Azure](http://azure.com).

trans-unit.source: You sign in with a Microsoft account, which you might have for Windows, XBox Live, or other Microsoft cloud services.
trans-unit.target: You sign in with a Microsoft account, which you might have for Windows, XBox Live, or other Microsoft cloud services.

trans-unit.source: Xcode 6 or later.
trans-unit.target: Xcode 6 or later.

trans-unit.source: The SDK runs on devices with iOS 6.0 or later.
trans-unit.target: The SDK runs on devices with iOS 6.0 or later.

trans-unit.source: Create an Application Insights resource
trans-unit.target: Create an Application Insights resource

trans-unit.source: In the [Azure portal][portal], create a new Application Insights resource.
trans-unit.target: In the [Azure portal][portal], create a new Application Insights resource.

trans-unit.source: Pick the iOS option.
trans-unit.target: Pick the iOS option.

trans-unit.source: Click New, Developer services, Application Insights
trans-unit.target: Click New, Developer services, Application Insights

trans-unit.source: The blade that opens is the place where you'll see performance and usage data about your app.
trans-unit.target: The blade that opens is the place where you'll see performance and usage data about your app.

trans-unit.source: To get back to it next time you login to Azure, you should find a tile for it on the start screen.
trans-unit.target: To get back to it next time you login to Azure, you should find a tile for it on the start screen.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively click Browse to find it.
trans-unit.target: Alternatively click Browse to find it.

trans-unit.source: Download Application Insights for Mac
trans-unit.target: Download Application Insights for Mac

trans-unit.source: (If you didn't do this already.)
trans-unit.target: (If you didn't do this already.)

trans-unit.source: Download [Application Insights for Mac](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=533209).
trans-unit.target: Download [Application Insights for Mac](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=533209).

trans-unit.source: Extract the zip file.
trans-unit.target: Extract the zip file.

trans-unit.source: Click the app icon to start Application Insights for Mac.
trans-unit.target: Click the app icon to start Application Insights for Mac.

trans-unit.source: Sign in to Azure
trans-unit.target: Sign in to Azure

trans-unit.source: Click **Sign In**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Sign In**.

trans-unit.source: Sign in with your Azure account.
trans-unit.target: Sign in with your Azure account.

trans-unit.source: Install the SDK in your application
trans-unit.target: Install the SDK in your application

trans-unit.source: Click **Integrate** to start the SDK integration.
trans-unit.target: Click **Integrate** to start the SDK integration.

trans-unit.source: Select your Xcode project from the list or click **Open Other** to find your project, then click **Integrate**.
trans-unit.target: Select your Xcode project from the list or click **Open Other** to find your project, then click **Integrate**.

trans-unit.source: Choose the folder for the Application Insights SDK, then click **Install**.
trans-unit.target: Choose the folder for the Application Insights SDK, then click **Install**.

trans-unit.source: Add this run script to your build phases: [Add Run Script Phase](http://hockeyapp.net/help/runscriptbuildphase/).
trans-unit.target: Add this run script to your build phases: [Add Run Script Phase](http://hockeyapp.net/help/runscriptbuildphase/).

trans-unit.source: Add the missing frameworks to your Xcode project.
trans-unit.target: Add the missing frameworks to your Xcode project.

trans-unit.source: Drag the Application Insights framework to your Xcode project, then click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: Drag the Application Insights framework to your Xcode project, then click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: Select **Integrate SDK into Target** for your target.
trans-unit.target: Select **Integrate SDK into Target** for your target.

trans-unit.source: Click **Create New Component** to create your app in the Application Insights portal.
trans-unit.target: Click **Create New Component** to create your app in the Application Insights portal.

trans-unit.source: Select your subscription, resource group, and enter a component name.
trans-unit.target: Select your subscription, resource group, and enter a component name.

trans-unit.source: In most cases, this should match your app's name.
trans-unit.target: In most cases, this should match your app's name.

trans-unit.source: Confirm with the **Create Resource** button.
trans-unit.target: Confirm with the **Create Resource** button.

trans-unit.source: Make sure the right component is selected, then click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: Make sure the right component is selected, then click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: Modify your source code as shown in the wizard, then click **Finish**.
trans-unit.target: Modify your source code as shown in the wizard, then click **Finish**.

trans-unit.source: Launch your app in the iOS simulator with **Build & Run**.
trans-unit.target: Launch your app in the iOS simulator with **Build & Run**.

trans-unit.source: Insert telemetry calls
trans-unit.target: Insert telemetry calls

trans-unit.source: Once `[MSAIApplicationInsights start]` is called, the SDK begins tracking sessions, page views, and any unhandled exceptions or crash.
trans-unit.target: Once `[MSAIApplicationInsights start]` is called, the SDK begins tracking sessions, page views, and any unhandled exceptions or crash.

trans-unit.source: You can add additional events as follows:
trans-unit.target: You can add additional events as follows:

trans-unit.source: View your data in Application Insights
trans-unit.target: View your data in Application Insights

trans-unit.source: Return to http://portal.azure.com and browse to your Application Insights resource.
trans-unit.target: Return to http://portal.azure.com and browse to your Application Insights resource.

trans-unit.source: Click **Search** to open [Diagnostic Search][diagnostic] - that's where the first events will appear.
trans-unit.target: Click **Search** to open [Diagnostic Search][diagnostic] - that's where the first events will appear.

trans-unit.source: If you don't see anything, wait a minute or two and click **Refresh**.
trans-unit.target: If you don't see anything, wait a minute or two and click **Refresh**.

trans-unit.source: Click Diagnostic Search
trans-unit.target: Click Diagnostic Search

trans-unit.source: As your app is used, data will appear in the overview blade.
trans-unit.target: As your app is used, data will appear in the overview blade.

trans-unit.source: Overview blade
trans-unit.target: Overview blade

trans-unit.source: Click any chart to get more detail.
trans-unit.target: Click any chart to get more detail.

trans-unit.source: For example, crashes:
trans-unit.target: For example, crashes:

trans-unit.source: Click the crash chart
trans-unit.target: Click the crash chart

trans-unit.source: Next Steps
trans-unit.target: Next Steps

trans-unit.source: [Track usage of your app][track]
trans-unit.target: [Track usage of your app][track]

trans-unit.source: [Diagnostic search][diagnostic]
trans-unit.target: [Diagnostic search][diagnostic]

trans-unit.source: [Metric Explorer][metrics]
trans-unit.target: [Metric Explorer][metrics]

trans-unit.source: [Troubleshooting][qna]
trans-unit.target: [Troubleshooting][qna]

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
